name: Workona Dark Theme
additional_info: This is the first time I create and publish s user style. It definitely isn’t perfect, but it suits my needs (darken the theme to avoid blinding my eyes). Tested on Firefox only. If someone whats to contribute, feel free to raise an issue or create a merge/pull request at GitLab.com. --- Below is the change log of the latest version. For full change log, see changelog.md in GitLab repository. Release v0.9 [20 November 2020] - Darken Add resource dialogue; - Change material icons colour to blue (#3370ff); - Hide new tab addon recommendation.
